awardsHtml:
13 wins & 22 nominations

Primetime Emmy Awards

Rob Harris (production designer) - Mickey Lennon (art director) - Emilia Roux (set decorator)

Alexa L. Fogel (casting director) - Christa Schamberger (s.a. casting director) - Suzanne Smith (uk casting director) - Gilly Poole (uk casting director)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Cinematography for a Miniseries or Movie
Ivan Strasburg (For episode "Combat Jack".)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Directing for a Miniseries, Movie or a Dramatic Special
Susanna White (For episode "Bomb In The Garden".)
2009 Nominee Primetime Emmy
Outstanding Single Camera Picture Editing for a Miniseries or a Movie
